Persona 4 game play combines the traditional role-playing game with elements of a simulation game.","description":"

Overview<\/h2>

Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 4 is a JRPG published by Atlus<\/a> and released for the PlayStation 2<\/a> on December 9, 2008 in the US. It takes place in a rural Japanese town called Inaba<\/a>. The plot centers around a mysterious TV-world and its connection to a series of grisly murders. Persona 4's gameplay is built on the foundation of Persona 3<\/a>'s dungeon crawling, with some revised and streamlined mechanics in its element-exploiting battle system. Social Links<\/a> also return, and aid in the fusion of Personas in the Velvet Room<\/a>, among other new benefits such as special party member actions in battle.<\/p>

Persona 4 was critically lauded upon release and was a commercial success, selling more than half a million copies worldwide. Merchandise released for the game include an original soundtrack, various toys, and an Amazon.com-exclusive Social Link Expansion Pack containing a shirt, calendar, plush, and soundtrack.<\/p>

Gameplay<\/h2>
